tool_description: Defines and maps content pillars based on brand positioning, audience needs, business goals, and competitive landscape to create a cohesive content framework.

brand_positioning.description: Brand positioning statement and key differentiators

industry_expertise.description: Areas of company expertise and authority

error_messages: Missing brand positioning: Provide a clear brand positioning statement.
Insufficient business goals: Include at least 2 business objectives.
Limited audience data: Provide at least 3 target audience insights.
Invalid input format: Ensure all text inputs are meaningful and descriptive.
usage: Provide brand_positioning, business_goals, and target_audience_data. Optionally include competitor_pillars and industry_expertise for better differentiation. Returns defined content pillars with strategic rationale.

pillar_rationale.description: Strategic reasoning for each content pillar

audience_alignment.description: How pillars align with audience needs
